freezing.description: It's [b]freezing[/b] here, biting through armor and [i]breath[/i] alike.

cold.description: It's [b]cold[/b] here, the kind that numbs fingers and makes steel feel [i]heavier[/i].

cool.description: It's [b]cool[/b] here, [i]crisp[/i] enough to wake the senses but not yet uncomfortable.

mild.description: It's [b]mild[/b] here, offering a rare moment of balance in the dungeonâ€™s chaos.

warm.description: It's [b]warm[/b] here, like stone that's been sitting under a steady sun for hours.

hot.description: It's [b]hot[/b] here, pressing in from all sides like an invisible [i]weight[/i].

sweltering.description: It's [b]sweltering[/b] here, heavy with heat and thick, [i]stifling[/i] air.

bone_chilling.description: It's [b]bone chilling[/b] here, as if something ancient and [i]cold[/i] watches from the dark.

humid.description: It's [b]humid[/b] here, making the air dense and your clothes cling with [i]sweat[/i].

dry_heat.description: It's a [b]dry heat[/b] here that cracks lips and fills the air with brittle [i]stillness[/i].
